name: Bike Steal
description:
Title: Bike Steal

Platform: PC

Genre: 2D Puzzle Plataform

Introduction

Welcome to Bike Steal game page. 
This game was developed for a university project, with the objective of leaning and using Unity and C#. The project goal was to create a game, with some new/interesting features.

Description

We decided to make a 2D Platformer, being a very popular genre of game, we had to introduce some diferente features. First we tried to create a interesting story line and them implement some mechanics, that would give the player a different experience, than others 2d Platformers.

Features

We wanted to introduce some mechanics that would change the way the player approched the levels, giving him different of ways to finish it.
We added diferente colored “walls”, each would give the player an effect, good or bad, that would help or complicate the players paths.


As this was a university project, it was recommended to use free assets from the store, here are the ones we used.

Assets

-Sunny Land (Background)

-Pixel Adventure 1 (Main Character)

-Nature pixel art base asstes (Ground/Tile Map)

Packages

-Text Mesh Pro (Dialog)

-Cinemachine (Camera)

Bugs/Difficulties

- Player box collider, with tile map collider. Weird bug that makes the player jump, without the command. We tried using a capsule collider for the player, smooths movement but creates another bug, player sometimes cant jump while running fast, because its recognized as being already in the air.

-We had a problem incorporating more than one dialog section, we had in mind finishing the game with one more dialog between the characters, revealing the plot.
